scripts.test: bash -lc 'server_sid=""; cleanup(){ if [ -n "$server_sid" ]; then kill -- -"$server_sid" 2>/dev/null || true; wait "$server_sid" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; }; trap cleanup EXIT INT TERM HUP; setsid node scripts/serve-static.cjs >/tmp/dawncaster-test-server.log 2>&1 & server_sid=$!; for i in {1..40}; do curl --silent --head --fail http://127.0.0.1:4173/cards.html >/dev/null && break; sleep 0.25; done; curl --silent --head --fail http://127.0.0.1:4173/cards.html >/dev/null || { echo "Server failed to start" >&2; exit 1; }; npx playwright test'
